name: Mail Ballots – Behind the Scenes
description: You’ve returned your mail ballot for the upcoming election. Now what happens to it? The mail ballot undergoes a secure process before it gets added to the count.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Reading Time:  < 1 minuteYou’ve returned your mail ballot for the upcoming election. Now what happens to it? The mail ballot undergoes a secure process before it gets added to the count.
See the process step-by-step from the moment it arrives at the Registrar’s office to when it gets counted.
